--- title: "Matching and Subclassification" --- ## DAG of online store ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_10c2d3b0973dbb918692da17c275855c'} ```{.r .cell-code} online_store <- dagify( C ~ A, C ~ B, D ~ C, D ~ A, D ~ B, E ~ A, E ~ B, E ~ D, coords = list(x = c(A = 3, B = 4, C = 3, D = 1, E = 5), y = c(A = 2, B = 2, C = 3, D = 1, E = 1)), labels = list(A = "age", B = "sex", C = "pre_avg_purch", D = "card", E = "avg_purch") ) # Plot DAG ggdag(online_store) + theme_dag() + geom_dag_point(color = "lightblue") + geom_dag_text(color = "black") + geom_dag_edges(edge_color = "black") + geom_dag_label_repel(aes(label = label)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](07_matching_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Naive estimate of the average treatment effect We estimate the average treatment effect by taking the difference between expected values of sales in treatment group (plus membership) and control group (non plus membership). $ATE = E[avg\_purch|card = 1] - E[avg\_purch|card = 1] = 25.2195$ ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_181aeb1282aa502aac38dddb6b2dee0a'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Expected values in treatment group E_avgpurch_card_1 = mean(unlist(membership[membership$card == 1,"avg_purch"])) # Expected values in control group E_avgpurch_card_0 = mean(unlist(membership[membership$card == 0,"avg_purch"])) # Naive estimate of ATE E_avgpurch_card_1 - E_avgpurch_card_0 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 25.2195 ``` ::: ::: A naive estimate obtained by regressing `avg_purch` on `card`. ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_61b6a2736698082fd2c57b645110b326'} ```{.r .cell-code} model_naive <- lm(avg_purch ~ card, data = membership) summary(model_naive) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = avg_purch ~ card, data = membership) #> #> Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -101.515 -20.684 -0.199 20.424 120.166 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 65.9397 0.3965 166.29 <2e-16 *** #> card 25.2195 0.6095 41.38 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 30.11 on 9998 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.1462, Adjusted R-squared: 0.1461 #> F-statistic: 1712 on 1 and 9998 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: ## Matching methods for more precise estimates #### 1. (Coarsened) Exact Matching ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_4394ddcb907ce89ac4ef09456ce75cac'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Without specifying coarsening # (1) Matching cem <- matchit(card ~ age + sex + pre_avg_purch, data = membership, method = 'cem', estimand = 'ATE') # Use matched data df_cem <- match.data(cem) # (2) Estimation model_cem <- lm(avg_purch ~ card, data = df_cem, weights = weights) summary(model_cem) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = avg_purch ~ card, data = df_cem, weights = weights) #> #> Weighted Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -159.349 -20.459 -0.151 19.863 161.528 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 69.9896 0.3984 175.66 <2e-16 *** #> card 15.2043 0.6137 24.77 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 30.12 on 9878 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.0585, Adjusted R-squared: 0.0584 #> F-statistic: 613.7 on 1 and 9878 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: #### 2. Nearest-Neighbor Matching ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_3983567d0a9ff6e272770e4184a1d76a'} ```{.r .cell-code} # (1) Matching # replace: one-to-one or one-to-many matching nn <- matchit(card ~ age + sex + pre_avg_purch, data = membership, method = "nearest", distance = "mahalanobis", replace = T) # Use matched data df_nn <- match.data(nn) # (2) Estimation model_nn <- lm(avg_purch ~ card, data = df_nn, weights = weights) summary(model_nn) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = avg_purch ~ card, data = df_nn, weights = weights) #> #> Weighted Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -132.730 -21.288 -1.675 18.318 146.631 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 76.5634 0.5881 130.19 <2e-16 *** #> card 14.5957 0.7514 19.42 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 30.43 on 6907 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.05179, Adjusted R-squared: 0.05166 #> F-statistic: 377.3 on 1 and 6907 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: #### 3. Inverse Probability Weighting ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_e6638e851d99f44e837722d8dece9ba0'} ```{.r .cell-code} # (1) Propensity scores model_prop <- glm(card ~ age + sex + pre_avg_purch, data = membership, family = binomial(link = "logit")) summary(model_prop) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> glm(formula = card ~ age + sex + pre_avg_purch, family = binomial(link = "logit"), #> data = membership) #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) #> (Intercept) -1.4298676 0.0752043 -19.013 <2e-16 *** #> age 0.0011486 0.0017761 0.647 0.518 #> sex 0.0359388 0.0412622 0.871 0.384 #> pre_avg_purch 0.0148262 0.0009264 16.003 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1) #> #> Null deviance: 13626 on 9999 degrees of freedom #> Residual deviance: 13249 on 9996 degrees of freedom #> AIC: 13257 #> #> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Add propensities to table df_aug <- membership %>% mutate(propensity = predict(model_prop, type = "response")) # Extend data by IPW scores df_ipw <- df_aug %>% mutate( ipw = (card/propensity) + ((1-card) / (1-propensity))) # (2) Estimation model_ipw <- lm(avg_purch ~ card, data = df_ipw, weights = ipw) summary(model_ipw) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = avg_purch ~ card, data = df_ipw, weights = ipw) #> #> Weighted Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -205.353 -28.995 -0.275 28.787 214.307 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 70.2628 0.4320 162.66 <2e-16 *** #> card 14.9573 0.6109 24.48 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 43.19 on 9998 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.05657, Adjusted R-squared: 0.05647 #> F-statistic: 599.5 on 1 and 9998 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Plot histogram of estimated propensities ggplot(df_aug, aes(x = propensity)) + geom_histogram(alpha = .8, color = "white", bins=30) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](07_matching_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### 4. Comparison of methods ::: {.cell hash='07_matching_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_4d74f04e6e76252053290a3b2048a68d'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Summary of naive and matching methods modelsummary::modelsummary(list("Naive" = model_naive, "CEM" = model_cem, "NN" = model_nn, "IPW" = model_ipw)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
